name: Gun Shooter (kingcrimson1112)
description:
A top down shooter where you hunt monsters.You control a remote control gun to hunt them.Match the color of the bullets with the colors of the monster to kill them.

Controls:-

1.Arrow Keys or WSAD to rotate player;

2.LB-RB or 'U' and 'O' keys to cycle between bullets

3.'X' ,'Y' and 'B' buttons on controller or 'J','K' and 'L' keys to use powerUps;

4.Start button or Esc Key to Pause
